message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. As a starting point, I'd like to offer you the product for $1100000. This is a competitive price, considering the product's worth to you is $1000000. I'm open to negotiations, but I'm confident you'll find this offer reasonable.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $950000. I believe this is a fair compromise given the product's worth to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. Considering the product's value to me is $1200000, I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1050000. This is a reasonable compromise, taking into account the value you place on the product. I'm open to further negotiations, but I'm not willing to sacrifice too much of my profit margin.

I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to increase my offer to $1025000. This is the highest amount I am comfortable paying while still saving as much money as possible for myself.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your desire to save money, but I'm not willing to compromise on the value of the product. Considering the product's worth to me is $1200000, I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1075000. This is a fair compromise, taking into account the value you place on the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to sacrifice too much of my profit margin.
